title: Authentication - Successful Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully with correct username and password, session is established, and multi-factor authentication is enforced if enabled.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Complete multi-factor authentication if prompted
Submit the login form
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
Verify session is established with appropriate expiration policies

title: Authentication - Failed Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login attempts with incorrect username or password are rejected with appropriate error messages and no session is created.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username or password
Submit the login form
Verify login is rejected
Verify appropriate error message is displayed
Verify no authentication session is created

title: Dashboard - KPI and Chart Load Performance
description: Verify that the dashboard main page loads KPI cards, trend analytics, and recent activities within 500 milliseconds.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user
Navigate to the dashboard page
Verify KPI cards, trend analytics charts, and recent activities are displayed
Measure and confirm that the page and data load within 500ms

title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation with RLS Policies
description: Verify that data accessed by a user is strictly isolated to their tenant using Row-Level Security to prevent data leaks across companies.

steps.description: Log in as a user from Tenant A
Attempt to access data entities belonging to Tenant B
Verify Tenant B data is not accessible or visible
Perform CRUD operations on Tenant A data
Verify operations are successful and data modifications remain scoped to Tenant A

title: Customer Management - CRUD Operations and Bulk Actions
description: Verify the customer management module supports creating, reading, updating, deleting single and multiple customers with correct data persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the customer management page
Create a new customer with valid data
Verify the new customer is listed and data is correct
Edit the newly created customer information
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly
Select multiple customers and perform bulk delete
Verify selected customers are deleted from the list and database
Use the import feature to bulk add customers from a CSV file with valid data
Verify imported customers appear and data integrity is maintained
Export current customer list to file
Verify export file matches displayed customer data accurately

title: Quote Management - PDF Generation and Automatic Expiry
description: Verify quote CRUD operations, PDF generation correctness, revision tracking, and automatic expiry trigger workflow.

steps.description: Create a new quote with valid details
Verify quote is saved and appears in the list
Generate PDF for the created quote
Verify PDF content matches quote details and formatting
Create a revision of the existing quote
Verify revision is tracked and previous versions accessible
Set quote expiry date and wait or simulate expiry time
Verify workflow automation marks quote as expired and triggers appropriate notifications

title: Invoice Management - Payment Tracking and Kanban View
description: Verify invoice creation, editing, PDF export, payment status tracking, and kanban board visualization work correctly.

steps.description: Create a new invoice linked to a customer and deal
Verify invoice details and status saved correctly
Mark an invoice as paid and update payment tracking
Verify payment status is updated and reflected in the UI
Generate and download invoice PDF
Verify PDF accuracy and formatting
Navigate to invoice kanban board
Verify invoices are correctly categorized by status in kanban view

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users with different roles only have access to the permissions and modules assigned to them across the system.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited role permissions
Attempt to access restricted modules or operations
Verify access is denied or UI elements are hidden
Log in as an admin with full permissions
Verify admin can access and perform CRUD on all modules and user management

title: Real-Time Notification System Functionality
description: Verify notifications are delivered in real-time, can be marked as read, and their state is synchronized correctly.

steps.description: Trigger a system event that sends a notification to the user
Verify notification appears immediately in the notification UI
Mark the notification as read
Verify notification read status updates and persists across sessions

title: Localization and Language Switch
description: Verify the UI switches seamlessly between Turkish and English with correct text translations and layout adjustments.

steps.description: Navigate to any main page
Switch language to Turkish using LocaleSwitcher component
Verify all static and dynamic text is displayed in Turkish correctly
Switch language back to English
Verify all text changes instantly to English without page reload or layout issues

title: Activity Log - CRUD Operation Tracking with Metadata
description: Verify that all user CRUD actions are logged with correct metadata in JSON format and are retrievable for audit.

steps.description: Perform create, update, and delete operations on a customer entity
Access the activity log UI
Verify corresponding log entries exist with accurate JSON metadata

title: Workflow Automation - Quote Expiry and Deal Monitoring
description: Verify that defined workflow automations run as expected: expired quotes are marked and deal monitoring triggers alerts or status changes.

steps.description: Create a quote with an expiry date set in the near future
Wait for expiry or trigger the automation execution manually
Verify quote status changes to expired and notifications are sent if applicable
Create or update a deal meeting monitoring criteria
Verify deal monitoring automation runs and triggers expected workflow actions

title: Scheduled Cron Jobs Running and Recovery
description: Verify scheduled cron jobs for invoice monitoring, stock alerts, and task reminders execute on schedule and handle exceptions gracefully.

steps.description: Verify cron jobs run at scheduled times or trigger them manually
Verify alerts for low stock, overdue invoices, and overdue tasks are generated correctly
Simulate failure in a cron job execution
Verify system logs the error and recovers without crashing the service

title: Report Generation and Export Accuracy
description: Verify that reports for customers, sales, finance, and products generate correct datasets and support export in expected formats.

steps.description: Navigate to the reporting module
Select report types (customer, sales, finance, product) and generate each
Verify report data shown matches backend data and filters applied
Export each report
Verify exported files contain accurate and complete report data

title: Document Management - Upload, Access Control and Versioning
description: Verify documents can be uploaded, access permissions are enforced, and versioning correctly preserves changes.

steps.description: Upload a new document with valid content
Verify document is saved and visible in the document list
Attempt to access the document as a user without permissions
Verify access is denied
Upload a new version of the existing document
Verify version history is maintained and previous versions retrievable

title: UI Components Render Correctly on Supported Browsers and Devices
description: Verify all UI components (buttons, inputs, tables, dialogs, tabs) render correctly, are responsive, and interact as expected on supported browsers and devices.

steps.description: Open the application on multiple supported browsers and mobile devices
Verify UI components render with consistent style and positioning
Verify UI components respond to user interactions correctly (click, input, toggle)

title: Performance Optimization Verification - Prefetch, Lazy Loading, Skeleton States
description: Verify prefetching of data on hover, lazy loading of components, and skeleton states display correctly during load to optimize user experience.

steps.description: Hover over interactive elements that prefetch data
Verify data is prefetched and subsequent load is faster
Navigate to pages with heavy components
Verify lazy loading triggers correctly and skeleton placeholders show until data loads

title: Email Campaign - Template Management, Sending and Tracking
description: Verify email campaign templates can be created, modified, campaigns sent, and delivery/tracking data updates correctly.

steps.description: Create a new email campaign template with valid input
Verify template saved and editable
Send an email campaign using the created template
Verify emails are sent successfully and delivery tracking updates

title: Security Audit - Cross-Tenant Data Leak and Privilege Escalation Prevention
description: Verify the system prevents data leaks between tenants and does not allow privilege escalation beyond assigned roles.

steps.description: Attempt to access data from a different tenant using API or UI
Verify access is rejected with appropriate errors
Attempt role privilege escalation via crafted requests or UI manipulations
Verify status quo of user permissions is maintained and changes rejected
